summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Watch Face Library & Creator for Widget OS. All core features working perfectly with excellent UI/UX implementation.
passed_tests: Watch Face Library page loads correctly at /widget-os/faces
All 8 pre-made faces displayed in beautiful grid layout (Minimal Dark, Gradient Pink, Widget Classic, Digital Block, Roman Classic, Gradient Green, Gradient Orange, Neon Blue)
Category filter buttons work perfectly (All, Minimal, Digital, Classic, Colorful, Neon, Custom)
Search functionality filters faces by name correctly
Face selection shows blue border and checkmark indicator
Selected face info panel appears with face details
Upload Custom button triggers file input properly
Connect Watch button visible and enabled (WebSerial supported)
Download face.json button appears when face selected
Flash to Watch button appears when face selected (properly disabled when not connected)
Navigation from Widget OS page to Watch Face Library works perfectly
Live animated time displays in digital faces (14:33 → 14:34 → 14:35)
Analog watch faces show rotating hands with proper animations
Customizer modal opens with full functionality (color pickers, name input, live preview)
WebSerial API detection and Connect Watch button state management
